plot: Nick, Hank and Wu search the woods for a tree-like Wesen dedicated to protecting Mother Nature, while Capt. Renard seeks insight into Diana's drawings.

When poachers are surprised by a Wesen who is a walking tree, they regret their decision. Soon Nick and the gang are trying to find this woodland Wesen. No one is to be alone after the encounter with the mirror with Eve. Meanwhile Eve, Rosalie and Monroe go back to the spice shop to look at the mirror, which is no longer broken, but it is bleeding. Leading Monroe to lock it back up. Nick, Hank, Wu, and Monroe try something drastic to lure the woodland Wesen out. What will happen when they face the creature?—stephen scialli
